Content: Turns should be split into process turns. This are turns without
player input in which oder are executed. Assume we have a slow ship
moving 2 hexes druing its turn and a fast one moving 10 and we split a
turn into 10 process turns, then the slow ships moves 1 hex on turn 3
and on turn 7 (middle values between 0 5 and 10), the fast ship moves
every turn. This concept permits more fluid and interesting battle.
